title: Susanne Alfvengren - Samling 84-85 (1991)  FLAC

Susanne Alfvengren, swedish singer, songwriter. She had a hit with her swedish version of \\\"Sometimes when we touch\\\" 1984. She is still active and highly respected for her lyrics and melodic ballads.
